short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search other platforms for the same component

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you search a component in Digikey, the extension will add hyperlinks to the same component in other platforms such as Mouser, Arrow and Future.
- You can compare the price
- You can see the stock in other platforms

While we are expanding to cover more domains, at this moment it works in these Digikey domains: 
.com, .ca, .tw, .kr, .hk, .fr, .jp, .cn
